name: Josh Williams
overview:
A visual designer by trade, Josh Williams is co-founder and CEO of [Gowalla](/company/gowalla), a consumer-media and social service inspiring people globally to express themselves and communicate about the everyday places and the extraordinary settings they enjoy.
Prior to Gowalla, he was Principal at Firewheel Design, a boutique user-interface consultancy, where his clients included Microsoft, Samsung, Hewlett Packard, Thompson Reuters and Causes. Josh lives in Austin, Texas with his wife and two daughters.
